data.comment: The match is underway at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Kashima at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kashima a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Cerezo.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 8, Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 12, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Cerezo.
In Osaka Kashima attack through Ryuji Izumi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 13, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Kashima's Juan Alano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 17, Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Kashima drive upfield and Juan Alano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
In the minute 23, Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Cerezo's area.
Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 29, Kashima push upfield and Everaldo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Cerezo defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Osaka.
In the minute 30, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Goal! Juan Alano gives Kashima a 0-1 lead in Osaka.
Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Free kick Cerezo.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Cerezo have an attacking throw-in.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Cerezo.
In the minute 36, Goal! Cerezo go level at 1-1 through Bruno Pereira Mendes in Osaka.
Tatsuhiro Sakamoto with an assist there.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kashima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 39, Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima's Kento Misao has been booked in Osaka.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kashima's half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 43, Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 45, Hajime Matsuo will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
In the minute 45, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Osaka.
Hajime Matsuo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Cerezo.
Ryuji Izumi for Kashima drives towards goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Kashima have got their heads in front thanks to a Everaldo strike.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo are whistled for offside.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Kashima at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Yasuki Kimoto is replacing Naoyuki Fujita for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Important block from the Cerezo defence as Everaldo fires in a strike for Kashima.
In the minute 53, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 55, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In Osaka Kashima drive forward through Leo Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Kashima at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Yusuke Maruhashi is on a sub for Eiichi Katayama for Cerezo.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
The home team replace Hiroaki Okuno with Yoichiro Kakitani.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Cerezo have an attacking throw-in.
Cerezo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Cerezo.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kashima throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 70, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 71, Matej Jonjic (Cerezo) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Leandro Desabato gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cerezo.
In the minute 72, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In Osaka, Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) misses the target with a header.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Osaka.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Kashima.
Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Kashima's area.
Ryuji Izumi (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Hajime Matsuo awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Ryotaro Araki is replacing Shoma Doi for the away team.
Kashima's Everaldo breaks free at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 79, Kashima make their second substitution with Koki Machida replacing Juan Alano.
In the minute 80, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 86, Ayumu Seko (Cerezo) gets a yellow card.
Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's fourth substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Koji Suzuki replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
The home team have replaced Hiroshi Kiyotake with Jun Nishikawa. This is the fifth substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
Cerezo attack and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Matej Jonjic but the ball cannons into the bar!
Jun Nishikawa for Cerezo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Free kick in a good position for Kashima!
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Kashima are caught offside.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ayase Ueda is on a sub for Everaldo for Kashima.
Kashima make their fourth substitution with Yasushi Endo replacing Ryuji Izumi.
The away team replace Leo Silva with Ryota Nagaki.
